pkgmetadata.longdescription: # nbcommon## changelog- 20200616: support number parameter in nearest api- 20200529: support FB in osrmapi- 20200513: FeatureSchema use UTC time- 20200508: add split_trips- 20200503: add cleanse GPSPin method to remove abnormal gps pin from list respecting specified threshold- 20200429: add model module to generate feature vector according to customized schema yaml- 20200413: add geo.to_poly_filter function. support converting to poly-filter format from single polygon geojson- 20200413: add geo.poly_to_geojson function. support converting to geojson format from single area poly filter file- 20200413: add geo.parse_poly function. parsing poly file to array of coords arrays
